name: Objection!
description:
OBJECTION!Description:

Items in video games. They’ve always been used and abused by players to aid in combat, and tossed to the side after use. Well they have decided NO MORE, it’s their turn to have the fun! Play as 1 of 4 sentient objects, pitted against one another to fight in designated combat trials, to see which object will reign supreme as the superior item.
